## Geometry.delete() method

Flags the underlying VAO and all attribute buffers for deletion. The geometry cannot be used afterwards.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
delete(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
